mapper.select: SELECT L.LO_NAME "LO_NAME" , C.CI_NAME "CI_NAME" , S.SCH_IDX "SCH_IDX" , S.SCR_IDX "SCR_IDX" , S.SCH_MOV_TYPE "SCH_MOV_TYPE" , M.TITLE "TITLE" , S.SCH_DATE "SCH_DATE" , S.SCH_RUN "SCH_RUN" , S.SCH_STIME "SCH_STIME" , S.SCH_ETIME "SCH_ETIME" , S.LO_IDX "LO_IDX" , S.CI_IDX "CI_IDX" FROM SCHEDULE S JOIN LOCATION L ON S.LO_IDX = L.LO_IDX JOIN CINEMA C ON S.LO_IDX = C.LO_IDX AND S.CI_IDX = C.CI_IDX JOIN MOVIE M ON S.SCH_MOV_TYPE = M.MOVIE_CATEGORY AND S.SCH_MOV_IDX = M.MOVIE_IDX ORDER BY 1, 2, 7, S.SCH_IDX * 1, S.SCR_IDX * 1, 5 DESC, 6
